statements: UPDATE dancer_profiles SET email='newemail@example.com' WHERE dancer_id=1
UPDATE dancer_profiles SET skills='{"style": "jazz", "level": "advanced"}' WHERE dancer_id=2
UPDATE dancer_profiles SET name = 'Alice', contact_number = '123-456-7890', email = 'alice@example.com' WHERE dancer_id = 1;
UPDATE dancer_profiles SET skills = '{"ballet": true, "jazz": false}', experience = '{"years": 5, "performances": 20}' WHERE dancer_id = 2;
UPDATE DancerProfiles SET email='newemail@example.com', bio='Updated bio' WHERE dancer_id=1;
UPDATE DanceCategories SET description='New description' WHERE category_id=2;
UPDATE DancerProfiles SET experience_years = 5, skills = 'Ballet, Jazz, Contemporary' WHERE dancer_id = 101;
UPDATE DanceCategories SET description = 'Popular genre of dance incorporating hip-hop and street dance elements' WHERE category_id = 3;
UPDATE DancerProfile SET full_name='Alice', email='alice@example.com', address='123 Main St' WHERE dancer_id=1;
UPDATE DancerSkills SET proficiency_level='Intermediate' WHERE dancer_id=1 AND skill_name='Ballet';
UPDATE DancerProfile SET address='123 Main Street, ABC City' WHERE dancer_id=1;
UPDATE DancerSkills SET proficiency_level='Intermediate' WHERE skill_name='Hip Hop' AND dancer_id=2;
UPDATE DancerProfiles SET email='newemail@example.com' WHERE dancer_id=1;
UPDATE Skills SET skill_name='Hip Hop' WHERE dancer_id=3;
UPDATE DancerProfiles SET phone_number = '+123456789' WHERE dancer_id = 101;
UPDATE ContactInfo SET address = '123 Main Street', city = 'New York', state = 'NY' WHERE dancer_id = 102;
UPDATE dancer_profiles SET phone_number='123-456-7890', email='john.doe@example.com', full_name='John Doe' WHERE profile_id=1;
UPDATE skills SET proficiency_level='advanced', skill_name='Ballet' WHERE skill_id=3;
UPDATE dancer_profiles SET full_name='Alice Smith', email='alice@example.com' WHERE profile_id=1;
UPDATE skills SET proficiency_level='advanced' WHERE skill_name='Ballet';
